meanings.definition: The study of the effects of time on biological systems.
meanings.sent1: In chronobiology, scientists explore how time affects living things.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in chronobiology investigate how biological systems are influenced by time.
meanings.sent3: The quirky professor joked that chronobiology is like a dance between time and living organisms.
meanings.sent4: To understand chronobiology, imagine time as a conductor orchestrating the rhythms of life.
meanings.sent5: The textbook vividly explains the intricate relationship between time and biological processes in chronobiology.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the periodicity of physiological phenomena.
meanings.sent1: Chronobiology focuses on the patterns of physiological events over time.
meanings.sent2: In the field of chronobiology, scientists study the regular cycles of biological functions.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously portrayed chronobiology as a clock that controls our body's functions.
meanings.sent4: She described chronobiology as a symphony of biological rhythms playing out in perfect time.
meanings.sent5: The documentary beautifully illustrates the intricate balance of physiological cycles explored in chronobiology.
